resources.string: This is a sample app with an imaginary functionality of saving some files into external storage, so the WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission is required.\n\nClick \"SAVE FILE\" to start experimenting with runtime permissions!
App needs permission to save files. Please click \"ALLOW\" in the upcoming system dialog.
App needs permission to save files. Please grant the \"Storage\" permission in system settings.
You can now save the file!
